=== Template for Help Pages ===
Ralink RT2860 wireless chip set is found in the EEE pc 901 and 1000/Linux and network cards and others. It should support wireless b/g/n functions. It is identified with '''lspci''' command as
<pre>
01:00.0 Network controller: RaLink RT2860
</pre>

==== Issues ====
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/344022|344022]]</nowiki> indicates trouble connecting to (some) wireless-n networks out of the box

* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/480477|480477]]</nowiki> with connection instability
* <nowiki>[[https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/linux/+bug/320390|320390]]</nowiki> doesn't connect to 802.1x network

=== Drivers ===
Some threads have reported success using newer or older drivers from the <nowiki>[[http://www.ralinktech.com/support.php?s=2 | ralink]]</nowiki> website (as of writing at 2.4.0.0 compared to the 1.8.0.0 version in the Ubuntu/Debian repository). A method of installing a new driver is <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=8544234&postcount=8|here]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1476007|here]]</nowiki>.
